altername_name: Yellow Brick Road III: Harapeko Tsuki To Hoshi Atsume
name: Yellow Brick Road: Harapeko Tsuki To Hoshi Atsume
overview: On his way to a star-collecting contest, the Scarecrow ends up encountering a star that's eaten both the Tin Man and the Cowardly Lion. He sets out to track them down while also trying to still make the contest. Unlike the last two Yellow Brick Road games, which were adventure/strategy hybrids, this game features heavy use of minigames instead.
